languages.text: "Вы сделали решительный ход, сразу же объявив о себе как о новом {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольном Торговце{/g} династии фон Валанциус, несмотря на то, что ваш статус еще не подтвержден ни одним значимым лицом {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Я ценю такие черты в людях — приятно понимать, с кем ты имеешь дело".

traits.locale_text: "Вы сделали решительный ход, сразу же объявив о себе как о новом Вольном Торговце рода фон Валанциус, несмотря на то, что ваш статус еще не подтвержден ни одним значимым лицом Империума. Я ценю такие черты в людях — приятно понимать, с кем ты имеешь дело".

languages.text: "It was a bold move on your part to announce yourself as the new {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the von Valancius dynasty despite not yet having your status confirmed by anyone of import from the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I appreciate such traits in people — it's good to understand who you're dealing with."
languages.original_text: "Вы сделали решительный ход, сразу же объявив о себе как о новом {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольном Торговце{/g} династии фон Валанциус, несмотря на то, что ваш статус еще не подтвержден ни одним значимым лицом {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Я ценю такие черты в людях — приятно понимать, с кем ты имеешь дело".

traits.locale_text: "It was a bold move on your part to announce yourself as the new Rogue Trader of House von Valancius despite not yet having your status confirmed by anyone of import from the Imperium. I appreciate such traits in people — it's good to realize who you're dealing with."

"It was a bold move on your part to announce yourself as the new Rogue Trader of House von Valancius despite not yet having your status confirmed by anyone of import from the Imperium. I appreciate such traits in people — it's good to realize who you're dealing with."

I appreciate such traits in people — it's good to understand who you're dealing with."

I appreciate such traits in people — it's good to understand who you're dealing with."

"It was a bold move on your part to announce yourself as the new {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the von Valancius dynasty despite not yet having your status confirmed by anyone of import from the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I appreciate such traits in people — it's good to understand who you're dealing with."

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の使いからまだ身分を確認されていない中で、自分をフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の新たな{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}だと明かしたのは、大胆な行動だったな。そういう気質の人物は評価に値する…相手にしているのが誰か理解するのは良いことだ」
languages.original_text: "It was a bold move on your part to announce yourself as the new {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the von Valancius dynasty despite not yet having your status confirmed by anyone of import from the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I appreciate such traits in people — it's good to understand who you're dealing with."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の使いからまだ身分を確認されていない中で、自分をフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の新たな{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}だと明かしたのは、大胆な行動だったな。そういう気質の人物は評価に値する…相手にしているのが誰か理解するのは良いことだ」

languages.text: “尽管您的身份还没有得到{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}任何重要人物的认可，但您宣布自己是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的新任{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，这是个大胆的举动。我很欣赏这样的特质，这能帮助别人了解他们是在和谁打交道，这是件好事。”
languages.original_text: "It was a bold move on your part to announce yourself as the new {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the von Valancius dynasty despite not yet having your status confirmed by anyone of import from the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I appreciate such traits in people — it's good to understand who you're dealing with."

traits.locale_text: “尽管您的身份还没有得到{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}任何重要人物的认可，但您宣布自己是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的新任{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，这是个大胆的举动。我很欣赏这样的特质，这能帮助别人了解他们是在和谁打交道，这是件好事。”

languages.text: «Una jugada muy valiente eso de proclamarse {mf|el nuevo|la nueva} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} de la dinastía von Valancius sin la aprobación nobiliaria de ninguna figura importante del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Aprecio la valentía en el prójimo; siempre es bueno saber con quién se está tratando».
languages.original_text: "It was a bold move on your part to announce yourself as the new {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the von Valancius dynasty despite not yet having your status confirmed by anyone of import from the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I appreciate such traits in people — it's good to understand who you're dealing with."

traits.locale_text: «Una jugada muy valiente eso de proclamarse {mf|el nuevo|la nueva} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} de la dinastía von Valancius sin la aprobación nobiliaria de ninguna figura importante del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Aprecio la valentía en el prójimo; siempre es bueno saber con quién se está tratando».

languages.text: « C'était très audacieux de votre part de vous octroyer le titre de {mf|nouveau|nouvelle} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} de la dynastie von Valancius sans même laisser le temps à un responsable de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} de confirmer votre statut. C'est le genre de trait de caractère que j'apprécie... Ça me permet de comprendre à qui j'ai affaire. »
languages.original_text: "It was a bold move on your part to announce yourself as the new {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the von Valancius dynasty despite not yet having your status confirmed by anyone of import from the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I appreciate such traits in people — it's good to understand who you're dealing with."

traits.locale_text: « C'était très audacieux de votre part de vous octroyer le titre de {mf|nouveau|nouvelle} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} de la dynastie von Valancius sans même laisser le temps à un responsable de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} de confirmer votre statut. C'est le genre de trait de caractère que j'apprécie... Ça me permet de comprendre à qui j'ai affaire. »

languages.text: "Es war mutig von Euch, als {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|neuer Freihändler|neue Freihändlerin}{/g} der Dynastie von Valancius aufzutreten, obwohl Euer Status noch von niemandem von Rang aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} bestätigt ist. Ich schätze derlei Eigenschaften – es ist gut, zu wissen, mit wem man es zu tun hat."
languages.original_text: "It was a bold move on your part to announce yourself as the new {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the von Valancius dynasty despite not yet having your status confirmed by anyone of import from the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I appreciate such traits in people — it's good to understand who you're dealing with."

traits.locale_text: "Es war mutig von Euch, als {mf|neuer Freihändler|neue Freihändlerin} der Dynastie von Valancius aufzutreten, obwohl Euer Status noch von niemandem von Rang aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} bestätigt ist. Ich schätze derlei Eigenschaften – es ist gut, zu wissen, mit wem man es zu tun hat."

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} kayda değer bir makamı tarafından henüz onaylanmamış olmanıza rağmen kendinizi von Valancius hanedanlığının yeni {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'i{/g} ilan etmeniz cesurca bir hamleydi. İnsanlarda bu tür özellikleri takdir ederim, karşınızda kim olduğunu bilmek iyidir."
languages.original_text: "It was a bold move on your part to announce yourself as the new {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the von Valancius dynasty despite not yet having your status confirmed by anyone of import from the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I appreciate such traits in people — it's good to understand who you're dealing with."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'tan kayda değer herhangi biri tarafından mevkiniz henüz onaylanmamış olmasına rağmen kendinizi von Valancius hanedanlığının yeni {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'i ilan etmeniz cesur bir hamleydi. İnsanlarda bu tür özellikleri takdir ederim, iş yaptığınız insanı tanımak iyidir."
